    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void draw()
      Draw all elements in the game by current frame.
      void drawAllline()
      use for loop to draw all the lines that not be collided
      void drawballonBar()
      draw balls on bar and handling movement of balls on bar
      void drawCurrentline()
      draw current line that haven been added into lines list.
      void drawgametime()
      display the remainning game time
      void drawScore()
      display the score
      void drawspawntime()
      display the interval of next spawn
      void endanimation()
      implenment ending animation.
      char getLastPressedKey() 
      int getscore(java.lang.String ballcolor, java.lang.String holecolor)
      calculate the socre based on the color of the hole and the ball.
      processing.core.PImage getSprite(java.lang.String s)
      this method use a hashmap to store the image name and image location, user can easily load image by using the name of image.
      void keyPressed(processing.event.KeyEvent event) 
      void keyReleased()
      Receive key released signal from the keyboard.
      void levelend()
      check if there are balls on bar, and balls on board, if there are no ball on bar and on board display ending animation.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void mouseDragged(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
      receive mouse dragging signal from the mouse.
      void mousePressed(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
      receive mouse pressed signal from the mouse.
      void mouseReleased(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
      receive mouse release signal from the mouse.
      void settings()
      Initialise the setting of the window size.
      void setup()
      Load all resources such as images.
      void spawnBallOnBar()
      when spawning time is up, randomly choose a spawner to spawn the ball on board.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSprite

        public processing.core.PImage getSprite(java.lang.String s)
        this method use a hashmap to store the image name and image location, user can easily load image by using the name of image.
        参数:
        s - the name of image.
        返回:
        return a PImage of corresponding key word.

      • settings

        public void settings()
        Initialise the setting of the window size.
        覆盖:
        settings 在类中 processing.core.PApplet

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images. Initialise the elements such as the player and map elements. initialize all the array list that we need to use in the programme. put color and corresponding number in a map. read config json file, get all the data, create new ball, hole,spawner, wall and linesegment instances.
        覆盖:
        setup 在类中 processing.core.PApplet

      • endanimation

        public void endanimation()
        implenment ending animation.

      • mouseDragged

        public void mouseDragged(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
        receive mouse dragging signal from the mouse. keep creating new linesegment instances.
        覆盖:
        mouseDragged 在类中 processing.core.PApplet

      • mouseReleased

        public void mouseReleased(processing.event.MouseEvent e)
        receive mouse release signal from the mouse. add new linesegment instances into list.
        覆盖:
        mouseReleased 在类中 processing.core.PApplet

      • getscore

        public int getscore(java.lang.String ballcolor,
                    java.lang.String holecolor)
        calculate the socre based on the color of the hole and the ball.
        参数:
        ballcolor - the color of the ball
        holecolor - the color of the hole that the ball get in.
        返回:
        score
